name: Find Traps
description: You sense the presence of any trap within line of sight and range. A trap for this spell includes anything that would inflict a sudden or unexpected effect you consider harmful or undesirable, which was specifically intended as a trap. This spell only reveals that a trap is present; you learn the general nature of the danger but not its exact location or trigger.

effects.description: Sense presence and general nature of any traps in line of sight within range; does not reveal exact location or trigger.
